meanings.definition: The process by which the immune system is generated.
meanings.sent1: Understanding immunogenesis helps us see how our body fights off illnesses.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study immunogenesis to learn how to keep us healthy.
meanings.sent3: The classroom erupted in cheers when the teacher explained immunogenesis with a fun song.
meanings.sent4: Immunogenesis is like an army being trained to protect the body from invaders.
meanings.sent5: The book vividly described immunogenesis as the superhero origin story of our immune system.

meanings.definition: The development of immunity in an organism.
meanings.sent1: After vaccination, immunogenesis helps the body become resistant to diseases.
meanings.sent2: Immunogenesis is crucial for staying strong against infections.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to think immunogenesis was just an excuse for extra naps.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of health, immunogenesis is the shield that protects us.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed immunogenesis as the growth of a protective shield around the body.
